about_the_game:
Contains the new vocal theme/BGM composed for "Dies irae ~Interview with Kaziklu Bey~" as soundtrack DLC. Wilhelm's theme song, "Rozen Vamp" is also included as a bonus track.

*This soundtrack DLC is identical to the content of the original mini-album CD "Dominus tecum" (JAN code: 4529904003352) sold in Japan in 2016. The DLC will provide these tracks in MP3 and FLAC format.

Dies irae ~Interview with Kaziklu Bey~ - OST ｢Dominus tecum｣ Track List

01.Der Vampir
02.Salvator
03.Vive hodie
04.Si vis amari ama
05.Solaris
06.Tenebrae
07.Albus noctes
08.Kiss In The Dark
09.Methuselah
10.Metatron
11.Der Vampir (short)
12.Der Vampir (offmix)
13.Rozen Vamp

Note: The DLC data will be added into the game's installation folder. A folder titled "OST" containing the MP3 and FLAC data will be added.
